name: Space Man！
description:
The word’s 3 million players with space man.
Space man Ben is going mars exploration mission.The complex terrain of the planet. He need to keep using space boosters ,leap dangerous ,to avoid air barrier!
Characteristic
- Smplicity for operation
- Unique personality
- Challenging
- Beautiful picture

Game method
-Help space man avoid obstacles
-Click screen used your booster takes off
-Fuel limited, reply back to the ground before running out
-Only running the ground to get effective data
Help Ben to through more obstacles ,let human footprint across mars.

If you like “Space man” and willing spent few minutes to score for the application, we will appreciate it very much. It’s helpful with us.Thank you !
